project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Develop a Python-based quiz game that asks multiple-choice questions, keeps track of the user's score, and displays it at the end of the game. The questions and answers will be stored in a variable within the code.

task.name: Implement a variable to store questions and answers
Develop the logic to display questions and collect user input
Create a function to display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests for each of the implemented features
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
